website_summaries.verdict: Several small pieces pack easily and also provide a great backside workout.
pros: Strengthens your core, glutes, and abs
Sliding discs are knee friendly, protecting joints and tendons
Dual-sided discs can be used on most surfaces
We love the variety of pieces that come with this kit that targets multiple muscle groups
cons: Sliders may not work on all floors

customer_reviews.title: Not good on some floors
customer_reviews.text: These sliders do not work on a smooth concrete basement floor. *edited review: Added an additional star for the company's dedication to customer service. Although these didn't work for me, they gave me a full refund and sent me a free set to give away as a gift. I bought the Beach Body version of these, and they barely work on my floor. I'm concluding that the issue is my floor and not these discs.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: First time purchaser of “sliders”
customer_reviews.text: The Sliders are a great quality, there is a foam/rubberes side to keep your sneakered feet in place and the plastic side glides smoothly on my tiled floor, I’m sure it’s great for carpeted floors. I am very please with the simple design but high quality of the product and easy to clean plastic side the touches the floor. The resistance bands are great! I use the light resist for arm and thigh exercises slowly gravitating to medium and hard resistance bands but they are all great quality, sturdy rubber and don’t feel like I can easily snap them. I recommend this purchase for any and every one, 100%
customer_reviews.author: EmilyRoxURsoX

customer_reviews.title: Lightest band ripped after 1 workout.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Amazing customer service! The company reached out to me on the day I wrote this. No questions asked, they sent me a brand new set! I will definitely continue my business with them. Thanks! I ordered these for 80 Day Obsession. The slides are great, but I'm still not decided on the bands. The gray one ripped after the first workout... I know this happens, but on the first day? The greater resistance bands are obviously thicker, but they are still intact. They do roll, but that seems to be a learning curve and common with all bands you buy.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: I have been using these and they are great and a fraction of the cost to boot
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for Beachboy's 80 Day Obsession after returning the ones I purchased from Beachboy cause the "booties" kept slipping off the sliders. I workout on a rubber mat floor and they just were not working. I have been using these and they are great and a fraction of the cost to boot. They are very well constructed, not flimsy.....I'm a avid exerciser and these have stood the test, I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: KCA

customer_reviews.title: Inspect carefully *update in review*
customer_reviews.text: I have only used these for one week and I always carefully store the and the medium resistance red band already has a tiny tear in the middle of the band. I am afraid to use it because it might snap on me. I should have inspected them before using, because it very well could have been like that when I received it. **Edited** I was immediately contacted by this seller and they sent me a brand new set of bands and sliders. I found no defects in the second set. I am very impressed with their customer service and how they stand behind their products. I would definitely recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: They do the job and have the normal issues.
customer_reviews.text: Using these for 80 Day Obsession. This set gets the job done, but as always, the bands don't stay put. The heavier bands have gotten slightly better with practice, but the lighter bands are just useless. I have bigger thighs, so maybe that's why. I like the sliders okay, but I think I would prefer the ones that have a lip on them (like a frisbie & like the BeachBody ones they use on 80DO). These sometimes dig into the carpet and I have to shift my weight to get it moving again. The discs are also a little small if you have to have both feet on one disc. I like all the colors though!
customer_reviews.author: klclyn

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT & top notch seller/company/customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE AMAZING!!!! I highly HIGHLY recommend anyone who is looking for resistance bands and sliding disks bc these do the job!! Also this company is one of the best I have ever purchased from the seller is so quick to respond to ANY and ALL questions! I would give 100 ⭐️ if could. I never even leave reviews but I was so happy w this product and seller I just had to! Hope y’all enjoy as much as I do (plus it’s an amazing price for all that you get!!)
customer_reviews.author: jpeach

customer_reviews.title: They seem to be good quality and perfect for the Beachbody program
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use with 80 day obsession, which starts in January. They seem to be good quality and perfect for the Beachbody program.
customer_reviews.author: tessytheterror

customer_reviews.title: Nice but don’t think it will work for me.
customer_reviews.text: The sliders dig into the carpet. They are flat and need to curve up around the edges. I ended up putting paper plates under them and it worked better but in reality I could just use paper plates. The bands seemed to roll a lot. I spent a lot of time fiddling with them during my workouts. Not going to lie I have thicker thighs so this is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Deoji's Mom

customer_reviews.title: A great buy for Outdoor fitness
customer_reviews.text: I bought these discs for my husband . He's really happy about them,he uses them for working out outdoors. The disks are soft on one side and solid plastic on the other so they are a conveniant way to protect your hands when you workout outside on the grass,concrete ,etc. A Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Liana

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great package for the money. The resistance bands are of good quality and durability. The sliders are good, but don't slide well on my gym's rubber floors (otherwise this would be a 5 star review). They offer three good exercise book downloads, and some exercise videos to show you some routines using the equipment. Some of the videos are in Spanish, which was suprising to me but you can follow along nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: SSylvia

customer_reviews.title: So far they are great, great deal for gliding discs and bands
customer_reviews.text: So far they are great, great deal for gliding discs and bands, I will say the bands are pretty small I just hope they do last. Im a bit scared to stretch them to much and for them to just snap. The pdf they give you that have workouts you can conduct with equipment looks confusing since its little drawings. I would recommend doing some videos for the customers so they can know how to properly do their workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Lizbeth

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: I just started using these so i think it is really is too early to give a good review, but i will say i was impressed with the packaging, i like the resistance bands quality & appearance, the disk are ok but you have to wear shoes to keep your foot on the disk + it doesn't slide easily on ALL SURFACES, and i am disappointed that they did not give you a pamphlet with ANY type of exercises for the bands or the disk. (Bummer!) :(( I'm gonna try and make it work for me a few+ more times at least before completely judging the product though.
customer_reviews.author: MissyMe

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Works great for 80 Day Obsession by Beachbody!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in hopes to use them for the Beachbody 80 Day Obsession and so far they are working out perfectly! The gliding discs work great on my hardwood floors. I don’t have carpet so I haven’t tried on that yet but they look like they would work fine. These are a great, less expensive alternative to the beachbody equipment, especially if you have all of the other items and don’t want to buy the entire package.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Check Sizing for bands
customer_reviews.text: Really digging the disks love that they have the option to go on carpet or flooring! The bands on the other hand seem good quality, however they came really big I wanted to buy some like my sisters I didn’t know they came in sizes Hera hug my legs more making it more of a workout. Where as the ones I received are bigger round and fall down making it hard to get a good work out it. The only one that fits good is the XHeavy.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka

customer_reviews.title: Works well; good purchase
customer_reviews.text: The sliders are great! I like using the soft side on my hardwood floors. The bands have worked well, too. I bought these in preparation for 80 Day Obsession and I have no complaints! Also the bag is very helpful for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Must have for core and chest workouts
customer_reviews.text: When this package got delivered I was a bit disappointed with the bands coz I thought they were small and I'd rip right through them. HOW WRONG! These kit is amazing and a must have for any home gym. The bands are good quality you stretch them out and the go back to original form (not to add that the black one is really heavy duty, I haven't been able to use it). The gliders are well built. Works on carpets and tiles or laminated floor well. Awesome kit!
customer_reviews.author: Kimani Kinuthia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Internet App Workouts
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for workouts Available through an app since we cut the cord and receive all tv via the internet. Subscribed to an app for workouts to supplement gym time and couldn’t be happier. The sliders take some time to get used to. What I mean is foot and toe placement in order to complete the moves and you don’t look like a fish flailing around on the carpet. The bands are awesome and high quality, as are the sliders. Great product from some an amazing company, shipped and delivered on time with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Iams

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.text: The sliders and bands are perfect for my workouts. I don’t have any issue at all with breakage, or sliding. The sliders glide easily across carpet, and can be turned on either side, depending on what surface you are using them on. The bands can also be doubled up, if you feel they don’t give you what you need. Best of all, they come in a small carrying bag for easy travel or storage.
customer_reviews.author: Tennesseepumpkin

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality for the price! I have used the sliders two separate times, once on carpet (worked great!) once on hardwood (worked well enough but didn’t slide as smooth as I had hoped, made the workout a little more intense). I loved that there were 5 different band ‘strengths’, other sets I considered only had 3. I have used the bands on 8 different occasions with zero issues. Products came well packaged, with bands wrapped individually. Extremely satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: kris

customer_reviews.title: The bands are labeled x-light through x-heavy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a personal trainer. I use the sliders & bands with my clients. The sliders work well, as do the bands. The bands are better than many of the other bands I’ve used that are too thin (thus rolling & twisting when used) or too tight or loose because the diameter is off. I REALLY appreciate the sizing printed on the bands. That is truly helpful. Very Satisfied! Kate R. New York
customer_reviews.author: Kate R. - New York

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: These bands are great! I’ve been using them with Beachbody 80 day obsession. They are better than the Beachbody bands and cost a lot less. (It includes the sliders too) The bands have a heavy band and an extra heavy band, which is great for 80 day obsession as you get stronger. It comes with five bands. Beachbody only has 3. Also their customer service is AWESOME! I had a small tear in two of my bands and I emailed the company. John the owner contacted me almost immediately and sent me a brand new set, no questions asked. Customer service like that is rare these days.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie D. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Works great for 80 day workouts!
customer_reviews.text: The bands come in a good selection of resistance. The sliders are easy to use and slide fine on my indoor/outdoor rug in the basement. They are just what I needed for the 80 day obsession workouts and much more affordable than buying from BB direct.
customer_reviews.author: jjjacob

customer_reviews.title: Great for 80 Day Obsession
customer_reviews.text: I got the core sliders and resistance loops bundle 4 weeks ago and I have been using them during phases one and two of 80 Day Obsession (Beachbody) and they are been great! I have carpet that's a bit longer, and the plastic side of the sliders are fantastic on it, I can't speak for how they are on hard floors. The loops have been great, I wish they took a bit longer to wear but I have just been doubling up with them and it's fine. Very sturdy, no issues with rips in them. Great price, I got it the next day, and they definitely upped my fitness level!
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: wonderful item!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after using something similar in my gym class. These work great on all surfaces and I love how portable they are. I recently took them on vacation with me so I could at least keep up some kind of exercise routine. They are fun to use and the additional resistance bands really help in adding a challenge to your workout. This is a great set at a very reasonable price. I highly recommend. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Beans

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get these to really work on any surface. Tried them on the wood surface and now they're scuffed up. Tried them on carpet and they didn't really want to budge much. Chalk it up as a waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Datdude

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and easy to use!! My fat cries!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect!! They will make your fat cry!! I do 6 different excercises with these sliders and my inner thighs feel great! I'm far from fit and have plenty of cellulite so if I can benifit from these..any one can!
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS! Its a love/hate relationship...everything works amazing and was worth every penny but my core would love to argue that we hate these :) The bands are perfect for my petite frame and the sliders work awesome with the foam on the back for my hardwood floors. I am doing the 80 day obsession program and was thrilled that I could find the products I needed for a much more reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Charissa D.

customer_reviews.title: The discs are great, bands a little to be desired.
customer_reviews.text: The gliding discs are perfect. Work very well on my tiled floor and the carrying case is great. The bands are thinner than I expected, except the heavy which seems appropriate. However using the bands one week, my medium already broke right in half.
customer_reviews.author: Britt M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for workouts on the go
customer_reviews.text: I don't like going to the gym because there are so many people there. This is an easy and convenient way to workout. I do pilates reformer 2-3 times a week, and do some other form of cardio in between. I create my own exercises, or follow along with someone on social media that use similar products to workout. The product arrived as expected. I would definitely recommend this to friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This package cane in a nice little package that allows everything to be packed back away which is really nice. I haven’t used the sliders yet but I did use the bands and they worked great. I also appreciated the great customer service and personalized email from the owner of the company. Overall, I recommend buying this package.
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Baught these to help build up my core muscles because I am so out of shape from the winter months and let me tell you three sets of mountain climbers were tuff but made easier with the gliders. I'm a beginner so I'm hope with regular workouts I'll build up strength
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Biff

customer_reviews.title: The sliders arebt too bad. They get the job done
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using these for almost 5 weeks now. The sliders arebt too bad. They get the job done. My issue is with the bands. They roll up quite a bit. No matter if you are wearing pants are not. The light is way to light. They kinda feel like balloon type material.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great products AND great customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: The bands and discs have been great! Both provide a great workout and both are made of good quality!! I unfortunately had a defective band with a tear but the customer service provided by John Borchent was top notch! He provided a timely response along with a quick turnaround of sending out another product. To my surprise when I received the product sooner than he estimated, he had sent me a whole new set of bands and sliders!! What a wonderful, generous surprise that is very much appreciated. I highly recommend the bands and sliders to get a different and effective workout in!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.text: The sliders and resistance bands work amazing. I love the different weights of the bands and the sliders work really well on my carpet. The bag is very helpful keeping them all together! The resistance bands do bunch up on me pretty frequently but that is because I probably should have went with 12 inch resistance bands because of my leg size but this was my first time using them so I was not sure what size to go with. But other than that I definitely recommend them and they work great for 80 day obsession!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Borchent core sliders for my husband. I liked that it came with Resistance bands and a little pouch. I was skeptical that my husband would use this product, but to his credit, he does. He uses this every day. Items were as described. Great quality product. The item was shipped and arrived by the stated date. I may even use these when he isn't looking.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Curran

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have started doing High Intensity Interval Training (HIIT). As I was looking for the equipment we would need, I came across these sliders and resistance bands from Borchent. We have been using them for about a month now. They are great quality and are only about half the cost of comparable sliders and bands. I also really like that they come with a bag that they can be stored in. Thanks, Borchent, for making a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing product
customer_reviews.text: The product I got seemed to be used. So I didn’t get a chance to test these out. Just for information the sliders are very small and don’t have a cover on them. These won’t work on hard wood floors. I ordered them for 80 day obsession but will get the actual set from Beachbody.
customer_reviews.author: fc1781

customer_reviews.title: A little too wide for me
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but the diameter is a little too wide for my use with exercising. They keep wanting to come off with some of my exercises. I found out after I purchased them, you can buy bands that have a smaller diameter. Still using them though with modifications when necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Great set! Only complaint is that I wish the loops were a little smaller! I just the slide on carpet almost everyday and haven’t had a problem yet!
customer_reviews.author: Shane and Heather

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the product
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my home gym and found them to be exactly what I needed to round out my equipment. The sliders work well on my carpeted surface and there is a great range of resistance bands to cover the variations in exercises and strength levels I use them for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am using them on a rug and they slide just fine. The bands that came with also seem to ...
customer_reviews.text: The discs are a decent size. I am using them on a rug and they slide just fine. The bands that came with also seem to be good quality. This is my first experience with both discs and bands so I don't have anything to compare it to. But I would buy them again, so I guess that speaks to the quality.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Take Your Workout Anywhere
customer_reviews.text: Quality products for a great price. I have used these items a few times now & they really go well with my home workout program. Sliders work amazingly well on carpet. Resistance bands are made well & clearly marked for their level. I love the storage bag that all items fit nicely in. The bonus workouts on the website are great but can be used with other mass market home workout streaming or dvds.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Better than Beach Body
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my beachbody program, to have a second set of sliders for my daughter and different strengths of bands. I actually liked this set better than the one beach body sells. The smaller sliders are easier to use and more durable in comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: If you want to work on your legs, this is it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for leg exercises, the bag is great to keep it all in there and to not lose. I would definitely recommend this item, no issues at all just great workouts to challenge me.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Evans

customer_reviews.title: Works for the price
customer_reviews.text: The Loops are awesome, I've been doing 80 day obsession and they work great. The only problem I had were on the core sliders. They work good enough, but I wish they were bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Great option for your 80 Day Obsession Workouts
customer_reviews.text: I use these with 80 Day Obsession. The loops are the closest things I have found to replace my smaller Beachbody ones (8" or 9") that are starting to tear. The Sliders are exactly the same as what Beachbody sent me (not what the cast uses in the video)
customer_reviews.author: J. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Great bands
customer_reviews.text: The bands are great. I’ve used them several times. The floor sliders don’t work that great on carpet. They don’t slide easily.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Agile and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Amazing affordable product Good quality Easy to travel pouch Variety of bands Sliders are good quality I dont leave for the gym with out it Great for at home work outs too
customer_reviews.author: Letitia

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for real good quality resistance bands and sliders. I bought one from somewhere else and they tore off in few months. I found these on amazon with good reviews. And i am really impressed with the quality. I enrolled to online workout program and same equipments are really expensive if I order them through online workout site. I am glad I found what I looking for
customer_reviews.author: Jasmeen Nirwal

customer_reviews.title: SO great! I am really glad I ordered these instead ...
customer_reviews.text: SO great! I am really glad I ordered these instead of the expensive ones made by ....the company that made the videos I'm using them for.... Really high quality bands and the sliders even work on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Young

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I received the email to review the product and didn’t want to bash the product to early... So I tried to use the product more. Let me start by saying the sliders are not by any means what I expected when it comes to the quality. But I thought their was hope still with stretchable Bands which I was also wrong about, yes they do stretch but they also curl/roll up while being used.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Abdelatif

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I received my discs and bands. All products are high quality and the bands don't slip off of your legs when using them for lower body work. The three strengths offered are great for working different muscle groups. Also, the discs are a great size -- no foot slippage and they fit my hands great too! I've used them both over the past few days and reviewed your PDF downloads, all very informative and helpful. Thanks for following up on my order, great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie manni

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed for 80 Day Obsession
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality slides and bands. I have been using these for only about a week so far and am hopeful that they hold up. Exactly what I needed for 80 Day Obsession at a lower price than what they would have been with Beachbody
customer_reviews.author: laa laa

customer_reviews.title: Just starting out
customer_reviews.text: I am new to these workout accessories, so I can't account for user error. What I've noticed so far is that the bands are surprisingly strong, but they do roll up and slip down on certain moves (again...it could just be me). The discs work well on carpet (haven't tried them on hard floors), but I do wish they were slightly bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy! Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: These products are awesome. I’ve never used gliding discs or resistance loops before but needed them for a workout program I do. They’re awesome and definitely push you to feel the burn. I’ve seen several other products like this sold individually and are more money so I’d highly recommend these to get 2 sets of products for the price of one.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Seegers

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this set a couple of times but so far I’m pretty impressed with the items. They all fit in the small bag they sent, all in all I would order again!
customer_reviews.author: Mac228

customer_reviews.title: Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: So far I have only used them a couple times, but have no complaints. You can use them on hardwood or carpet, just by flipping them over. Plus the additional of the resistance bands, what a buy!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Great value and super for travel
customer_reviews.text: Great pack for the price.. the bands are great resistance and the sliders work great on hard floors or carpet. I cant review on durability yet too soon to tell
customer_reviews.author: Karyn kolonoski

customer_reviews.title: Everything on this package is AMAZING. No need to hit the gym if you ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything on this package is AMAZING. No need to hit the gym if you have these items at home. Also, the pouch makes everything more convenient because I can keep them in my bag when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Erika P.

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I can feel the burn when using the discs for my legs and abs! Get tight and toned with a daily regimen.
customer_reviews.author: TnTExplore

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great core sliders and resistance bands bundle. I use the sliders mostly on the carpet but also on hardwood floor and I really love them. I like the sleek design of the sliders with nice black finish. The resistance bands are very good quality also. The bag that is included to carry the discs and the bands is very nice, helps keep them in one place. Great cost compared to other bundles.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandru

customer_reviews.title: I wish i had bought the expensive ones without wasting money on this
customer_reviews.text: The bands are ok.. too loose for my liking, the slides are just a no no. They are filmsy, and they dont do their job properly.
customer_reviews.author: Dadari83

customer_reviews.title: Great set for 80 day obsession!
customer_reviews.text: These are great sliders! I am using this set for 80 day obsession and its working great! The medium and heavy bands are also great. Very thick and work great for each excercise. The light band tho rolls down and is virtually impossible to use so thats kind of disappointing because id like to have it for different excercises but i cant use it. But other than that its a great set!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: After using gliding discs and resistance bands at the gym, I wanted to do more with them at home as well. Found this set and ordered - love them! The Heavy resistance band is not thick enough for me, nevertheless it works so well! I could feel the burn... Like the small bag that they came in - easy to take them along when travelling.
customer_reviews.author: Madhavi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! The sliders work great and the red and black bands have held up well to daily use. After the second use of the gray band it got a tear in it. I reached out to supplier and they were very responsive to my email. Today I received a complete new set! Would definitely recommend to new buyers!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Resistance bands work very well. The sliding discs however ...
customer_reviews.text: Resistance bands work very well. The sliding discs however i am not a fan of. I use them on the carpet and they do not stay under my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Erica V.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The bands slide on me so easy even using the highest weight and the sliders are hard to use on carpet. I do think the product is good for the price but some of my bands already have some tears after just a month of use at about 3-4 days a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Workouts much better
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a workout I signed up for. They were a cheaper alternative to what was suggested! The bands and sliders have held up really well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are still in great condition. I bought an additional set for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this set daily for 4 months now. They are still in great condition. I bought an additional set for my husband, but end up using two black loops for an exercise. These have really stepped up my workouts and helped me get in great shape! Thanks for making a quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Zombro

customer_reviews.title: Great product, I enjoy it very much
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I enjoy it very much. Love that it has the two different sides for different surfaces...(Just a suggestion: would be great to add a pamphlet or CD for the novice lifter so they have an idea on how to use it correctly and a variety of workouts)
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! All comes in a small carrying case. I highly recommend this product if you’re looking for a set like this!
customer_reviews.author: Paige T

customer_reviews.title: Great add to workout routine.
customer_reviews.text: I really like working out with these bands and sliders. You can do so many different workouts. I've had them for some months now and there is a small tear starting to develop in the one I use most. The core sliders are cool, just wish my feet stayed more secure on them while sliding instead of occasionally slipping off.
customer_reviews.author: Joelle C.

customer_reviews.title: Resistance loops broke on the second usage.
customer_reviews.text: Used it the first time - it did what it was supposed to. Used it a second time and the light and medium loops broke and tore. Not very good quality if it didn't even last for a second workout. Disappointed since everyone else wrote such good reviews. I will not be reordering from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Mildred K

customer_reviews.title: Bands work great as well
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use for 80 day obsession. I use on carpet and don’t have a problem at all. They are the right size and do t ha e a problem with my feet slipping off. Bands work great as well.
customer_reviews.author: stormtracker2011

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is so compact and easy for me to take on the go like vacation.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: Great bundle set and reasonable price. Just what I was looking for. I bought some other bands and they drove me crazy with how big the loop was. But these are perfect. And the sliders easy to use on every surface. Great for my at home workouts or easy to pack for on the go in the carrying pouch. Keeps it nice and tidy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Koval

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use and the bands are r durable and ...
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and the bands are r durable and stay well. I did not give 5 because I imagined the slides to be slightly bigger - but they still do the job and I am happy with the purchase. It came well packed and on time.
customer_reviews.author: MEENA RODKIN

customer_reviews.title: Love these bands
customer_reviews.text: I have not yet used the sliders but I love these bands. I have not had issues with rolling and they seem very durable and sturdy. Great price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I love this! We spend time exercising together. The discs move so easily and the bands are the perfect tensions. I’ve stretched them pretty far and no sign of breaking! Love the little storage bag for these items also!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Well designed sliders
customer_reviews.text: They work really well on hardwood floors and carpet! Band are also well made!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are awesome and work very well
customer_reviews.text: I used the sliders for a new workout I am doing. They are awesome and work very well. They have a carpet and hard floor option. I work out on carpet and the sliders glide without any problem. The resistance bands also seem to be true to their markings and allow a great work out as well I would highly recommend the produxt
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome slider set!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for 80 Day Obsession, and they work great!! The bands are very durable so far, and the sliders have worked for me both on carpet and hard floors. Definitely a worthwhile purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Fugill

customer_reviews.title: Awesome products
customer_reviews.text: Luv my bands and sliders are great just have to get use to using them. Found tons of workouts online to use with them. Will order again from them
customer_reviews.author: sindya laroche

customer_reviews.title: Broken band but replaced
customer_reviews.text: Overall the bands work great. I am on my 1st week of 80 day obsession and my pink light band is almost tore all the way through. Appears how it ripped that there was a weak spot or defect? The other 4 bands seem to be holding up well. I contacted the seller and am getting a whole new set of bands.
customer_reviews.author: J. LAMPPA

customer_reviews.title: a good way for a different workout
customer_reviews.text: This is a good alternative to burpies and all that. It is easy to use. Just make sure you are on a surface that will be easy for the core sliders.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Ulibarri

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 80 day obsession workouts.
customer_reviews.text: I got these instead of paying a lot off beachbody and they are just as good.
customer_reviews.author: FarmersWife

customer_reviews.title: An A+ for a quality product!
customer_reviews.text: This set is great! I’ve been using the bands and sliders for 80 Day Obsession and both are working out great. The bands are durable and sliders work well on carpet. They definitely help increase the workout intensity and would recommend to everyone even if it’s for a different workout program!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: this worked out great! It fit easily into my luggage and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from a 2 week trip to Greece and decided to buy this in attempt to have quick workouts each day...this worked out great! It fit easily into my luggage and I was able to use the bands outside and the discs in all our hotel rooms. Definitely felt the burn and better about all the bread and wine I consumed. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work great on carpet and great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: The sliders work great on my super short carpet and on my really thick shaggy rug carpet. I've been using this set for 80 day obsession. Both of my toes will fit in one slider, but I'm guessing two men's shoes would not fit on just one slider. The lightest band tore after a few days but I accidentally snagged my nail on it. So watch those nails ladies! So that was a bummer. The medium and heavy bands have been great! I love the little carry case. I actually just took the set with me on vacation. It was great! I would definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Sorenson

customer_reviews.title: No lip around the edge
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these on a Sat. night and they were delivered Sunday morning! Awesome timeliness! I have been using the sliders for 80 DAY Obsession and while they work, I wish they had a little more of a lip around the edge to keep my toes and heels in more securely. I have actually pushed them out from under me. Hoping that as I progress I can have more control of the sliders. The loops work great! All in all a fine product.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. C

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to Beachbody Loops and Slides
customer_reviews.text: Used these with the Beachbody 80 Day Obsession workouts. The slides are great, would be ok if they were just slightly bigger. And the bands work well, if I need more resistance, I just double up.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle L.P. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Grit Fitness clients LOVE this set!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING SET! I give this set to all of my clients. This decision was made after loving them myself. Amazing quality bands, adjusted for all levels of fitness. My clients can progress as necessary and use the gliders on both hardwood and carpet. This set gives my clients AMAZING at-home workout options and allows me to program a variety of movement patterns to get my clients the results they're looking for. TONS of uses for all pieces of this set. YOU NEED ONE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hardwood floors and the price
customer_reviews.text: I have hardwood floors, and after using them it looks like they have never been touched. The discs have protected the floors with no signs of scratching. The discs are real easy to use. I came upon these, because I needed them, and other discs I was looking at were more expensive. I decided to try these and I could not be happier. A well made product, and works great on my floors. These are well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas43

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love the different strengths of the bands. Very convenient for different training! Unless sliders are just brilliant. It all comes in a bag so you can take it all anywhere and everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Sole

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with bad joints
customer_reviews.text: I like the pink sliders, they make working out so much easier on my joints, I can now do certain moves that I could not do before like mountain climbers. Ab workouts are more efficient now that I have the sliders. The resistance bands are also great, there definitely giving me a better workout.
customer_reviews.author: Khayslip

customer_reviews.title: The gliding discs are awesome! The resistance bands on the hand are not ...
customer_reviews.text: The gliding discs are awesome! The resistance bands on the hand are not that great, they keep folding down which is a pain but honestly that's the only downfall. If you feel like that wouldn't be a problem for you than I would totally recommend!!! Aside from that love it !
customer_reviews.author: diana aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy product. Kicks my workouts up a notch! My only complaint is that the bands roll really bad... BUT I am not convinced this is the companies issue because 1. I’m new to using the bands, so I might take me a while to find a “sweet spot” and 2. I have chunky legs lol overall I’d purchase again and recommend to others :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: totally love and enjoy this product
customer_reviews.text: I took off one star because I also used these under my knees for "scooting" work in the gym and the red rubbed off onto my leggings. Otherwise, totally love and enjoy this product!
customer_reviews.author: DarDar

customer_reviews.title: Trustworthy product
customer_reviews.text: So far I love my bands and gliding discs. The bands are thin, but the material seems trustworthy to last long. I love the gliders! They work amazing on the right kind of floor. Either carpet or a hard floor. My abs are already sculpting. 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: morgan tremelling

product_meta.title: Core Sliders and 5 Resistance Bands for Fitness Equipment for Home for Intense, Low-Impact Exercises to Strengthen Core, Glutes, and Abs
feature_bullets: PERFECT FOR CORE – Strengthen your core with your sliding discs. Use them to target all muscles groups, from your abs to glutes and add the resistance loop bands to tone up your arms and your legs!

KNEE-FRIENDLY – Whether you suffered a recent injury or want to prevent achy knees, Borchent sliding discs are perfect for you. As your hands and feet never leave the floor while exercising, the discs reduce impact and protect your tendons and joints.

SMOOTH SLIDING – Dual sided so you could use them on most surfaces, your sliding discs slide beautifully on both carpets and floors. Just place them with the fabric side on the floor or with the plastic side on the carpet and start your workout!

SPECIAL BONUSES – When you spend your money on a product, you want to receive as much value as possible. For a limited time only, five different range resistance bands, one black carrying pouch, and an exercise guide come with your purchase and complete it.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEE – We’re so confident in the quality of our products that we give you a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you don’t absolutely love your Borchent Core Sliders and Resistance Bands, just send them back and we’ll refund you in full.
